attributes.action: Knight Tony Pulis and Put his Face on The £20 Note
attributes.background: After the 1-1 Draw against Spurs on 25/4/16 Pulis deserves some recognition as the greatest manager in the world (Bar Ranieri) As this has been made official by tonights result i feel as if Tony Should become Sir Tony Pulis and should be put on the £20 Note as one of this country's greatest heros

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours

Bank notes and their design are the responsibility of the Bank of England and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole. You can find out more here:

http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/pages/default.aspx
